itemizedlist.listitem: Public mode : this mode is for guest users (visitors) who have not registered yet and it doesn't require to sign in so they can only visit the public pages in a portal. Visitors can also register in order to get an account. After being registered, they can use the private mode and have to contact the administrator to get more rights or a group manager in order to become a member of that group.

Private mode : this mode is for registered users, users have to use username and password to sign in. This mode supports users take many actions such as :manage private resources (create private pages, edit or delete them), "borrow" pages from others by creating hyperlinks to existing pages, change the language for individual needs, manage private information.
